content.en: Parallel Simulation Optimization: Researchers have been investigating various aspects of parallel discrete event simulation and the role of algorithms in improving its performance. They have explored the strengths and weaknesses of optimistic approaches, estimated the performance of parallel simulators, and compared different synchronization protocols. Algorithms such as Elastic Time and Parameterized Time Warp have been found to outperform existing protocols. Additionally, frameworks like SPaDES and Unified Virtual Time have been developed to provide performance analysis and combine the advantages of conservative and optimistic synchronization.
content.da: Parallel Simulation Optimization: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige aspekter af parallel diskret hændelsessimulering og algoritmernes rolle i at forbedre ydeevnen. De har udforsket styrkerne og svaghederne ved optimistiske tilgange, estimeret ydeevnen af parallelle simulatorer og sammenlignet forskellige synkroniseringsprotokoller. Algoritmer som Elastic Time og Parameterized Time Warp har vist sig at overgå eksisterende protokoller. Derudover er rammer som SPaDES og Unified Virtual Time blevet udviklet til at levere ydelsesanalyse og kombinere fordelene ved konservativ og optimistisk synkronisering.
